attributes.action: honour the services of vic akers to ladies football
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Vic Akers is currently manager to the Arsenal ladies football team and has been a pioneer for ladies football over the past 20 years. He has achieved 30+ major trophies under his guidance including european,F.A.cups and league. He is due to retire his position at the end of this season, and has shown complete dedication to the advancement of ladies football over the past 20 years.He is a legend in his field. He deserves recognition for his services to the game with an honour.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
